Little did I know how gracious our distant relatives were. Once they found out about my brewing hobby they insisted we spend the afternoon on their hop farm! "You have a what?..."

Huge thanks to Sepp Rockermeier and his family! They had never met us but graciously took time out to show us around during the busiest part of their year.

Hop Stripper

The vine is hauled through the stripper

First Stage

The conveyer dumps the cones here

Separating Cones from Leaves and Stems

A series of chutes and drums performs the separation

Second Stage

Same room as the First Stage. The heat and humidity in here is incredible!

Separated Cones go up to the Top Loft

Third Stage

The drying floor. Moisture content goes to 10%.
